text: what are those mysterious white stripes
on chicken some chicken looks and tastes
different than it used to the proof
white stripes of fat and hardened muscle
and breast meat the consequence reduced
quality of raw cooked and marinated meat
the culprit unclear but some experts
think our insatiable appetite for
chicken may be a factor in 2016
each American consumed on average 91
pounds of chicken that's over 3 times
more than in 1960 to meet growing demand
the food industry now raises bigger
chickens faster in 1960 it took 63 days
to grow 3.3 5 pound bird now it takes
about 47 days to grow a 6.1 pound bird
white stripes and hardened muscles
aren't harmful to human health
researchers estimate they only turn up
in five to ten percent of breast meat
but researchers also found that these
two abnormalities affect meat quality
and severe cases they reduce the amount
of marinade that meat absorbs also
harden muscle and cook meat is tougher
to chew the issue has not gone unnoticed
by the food industry right now the
National chicken Council is funding over
$250,000 in research to find the cause
whatever the reason a bigger question is
on the horizon what get chickens look
like in the near future
[Music]
